rooms.name: entrance_hallway
rooms.description: spacious entry with ample natural light, designed for ease of wheelchair movement and featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the exterior wall.

rooms.name: living_room_1
rooms.description: a modern living space with an open concept layout that integrates seamlessly with adjoining dining area, enhanced by floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure abundant daylight and aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: living_room_2
rooms.description: a secondary living space designed as an intimate family area or entertainment zone, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light and visual connectivity.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: cozy dining space that aligns with the contemporary design aesthetic, complementing the living areas while ensuring accessibility for all users.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: open plan kitchen designed to be fully accessible and wheelchair friendly, incorporating modern appliances, ample storage, and floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to provide natural light.

rooms.name: guest_room
rooms.description: comfortable guest room with en-suite bathroom, ensuring privacy and adhering to accessibility norms with easy-to-navigate layouts.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: accessible washroom integrated within the guest area or as a separate facility, designed according to local building standards and Vastu principles for harmony.

openings.name: main_entry
openings.description: main entrance door with automatic sensors and a ramp for wheelchair access, ensuring safety and convenience in line with accessibility standards.

openings.name: exit_door
openings.description: emergency exit that meets local building codes and facilitates quick evacuation.

rooms.name: master_bedroom_1
rooms.description: luxury master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed to optimize natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows on the south-facing wall in compliance with Vastu.

rooms.name: master_bedroom_2
rooms.description: additional master bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, integrating modern amenities along with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance the sense of space.

rooms.name: bedroom_3
rooms.description: well-appointed bedroom ensuring ample space for occupants while maintaining a contemporary design approach and accessibility.

rooms.name: bedroom_4
rooms.description: compact bedroom designed to maximize utility in the duplex layout while offering modern finishes and optimal daylight through floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: ensuite_bathroom_1
rooms.description: private en-suite bathroom for master bedroom 1, designed with accessibility in mind using low sinks and grab bars.

rooms.name: ensuite_bathroom_2
rooms.description: private en-suite bathroom for master bedroom 2, incorporating accessible design features to ensure usability by wheelchair users.

openings.name: staircase
openings.description: spacious and well-lit staircase designed with gentle slopes and handrails on both sides to ensure safe wheelchair maneuverability between floors.

openings.name: emergency_exit_window
openings.description: safety window positioned strategically for emergency egress as per local building codes and Vastu considerations.
